column5: Hello Fellas & Gals, First let me wish everyone a very Happy and Prosperous New Year, Its been quite awhile since I posted here on OFC and I am sorry to bore you with this first post of mine for 2007. But I find it really important to do so and squelch the rumor that is raging from Windsor heading across the province. The Rumor: Willis "SNAGMAN" Beam along with a financier has took over ownership of WALLY's BAIT & TACKLE SHOP located in Windsor Ontario.  I Willis "SNAGMAN" Beam can assure everyone who hears of this rumor that it is completely false. I have not nor ever by myself or with a partner purchased or own WALLY'S BAIT & TACKLE SHOP.  I am an Independent Field Tester for companies like Milts Brand Tackle, Woodies Baits, Canadian Wiggler and Zebco/Quantum Rods-Reels. I also test for several other companies located both in Canada and the USA. I do not desire to own a tackleshop for that would interfere with my time on the water.  Bill Davies and Family own and operate WALLY'S BAIT & TACKLE SHOP on Sandwich Street in Windsor. If you haven't been there in awhile you should stop in and take a look at their new facelift for the store and some of their new items for 2007. The Davies family is a fine wholesome family and been in the business for a number of years and hopefully many more and they do not deserve this type of business distraction or bad rumor.  Thank You for all your Indulgence in this post!
well as long as we are clearing up rumors..  .it is not true that I have been Ron Jeremy stunt and close up double for the last 15 years
they make me wear a .....prosthetic..   chin to hide the hair........lol
Whew, glad you put that rumour to rest
For the record, I didn't buy Wally out either. In case you were wondering.
Shame on you Terry! That's spam! You're only trying to promote your pal Ron's business! LOL!
stop it before its started I say

Yup, me too. I was really thinking about it, but operating the shop would take too much time away from fishing, so I retracted the bid I was almost going to make. Glad I have my priorities straightened out.  Go fishing or work ? HMMMM !!!
Wait a minute does this mean it's for sale?  I'm going to my secret stash and start counting my pennies and put in an offer.
My cousin owned a fishing shop and the hours sucked.  He sold it after a few years.  People wanted bait 24/7.

I apologize to anyone and to this site who may have thought this post was a cheap shot at advertising or a spam for the business I mentioned. The rumor was real and was distracting for the business and it was just that a rumor. That I felt should be addressed.  Thanks for your indulgence its much appreciated.
